text: 1 of 23 of 23 Every year, the Veuve Clicquot Polo Classic takes place in New York City, inviting polo - lovers and all - around fashionistas and fashionistos to watch a polo match and enjoy a day of picknicking in Liberty Sate Park. Thanks to social media, the annual event has become a # Blackmoment, where everywhere comes dressed in their Sunday best. And whether you ’ re there or not, you ’ ll spend a lot of time just scramming through the gram, getting your life from these looks. And honestly, the flicks are amazing.
